LanguageData.CSChristmasSleigh.label: Christmas sleigh
LanguageData.CSChristmasSleigh.description:
A flying sleigh for transporting present during christmas. Can transport 1000kg. Use christmas spirit as fuel.
Does not work.
LanguageData.CSChristmasSpirit.label: Christmas spirit
LanguageData.CSChristmasSpirit.description: The spirit of christmas. It can be used as fuel for the christmas sleigh.
LanguageData.CSPresentBag.label: Present bag
LanguageData.CSPresentBag.description: A magical bag for transporting presents.
LanguageData.CSSkid.label: Skid
LanguageData.CSSkid.description: Some Skids for santa claus's christmas sleigh.
LanguageData.CSSleighCore.label: Sleigh core
LanguageData.CSSleighCore.description: The core of the christmas sleigh.
